TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlError extends System.Object

summary.span: 收集与 SQL Server 返回的警告或错误有关的信息。

span.span: Collects information relevant to a warning or error returned by SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是.NET Framework 数据提供程序为创建 SQL Server 时发生错误。This class is created by the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server when an error occurs. 实例是创建和管理通过，这反过来创建通过类。An instance of is created and managed by the , which in turn is created by the class. 严重级别为 10 或以下的消息为信息性的，并指示问题是由用户输入的信息中的错误导致的。Messages with a severity level of 10 or less are informational and indicate problems caused by mistakes in information that a user has entered. 严重级别为 11 到 16 都由用户，并可以由用户纠正。Severity levels from 11 through 16 are generated by the user, and can be corrected by the user. 严重级别为 17 到 25 的消息指示存在软件或硬件错误。Severity levels from 17 through 25 indicate software or hardware errors. 当级别为 17 时、 18 或 19 的错误时，您可以继续工作，尽管你可能不能够执行特定语句。When a level 17, 18, or 19 error occurs, you can continue working, although you might not be able to execute a particular statement. 当严重级别为 19 或以下时， 将保持打开状态。The remains open when the severity level is 19 or less. 当严重度等于或大于 20 时，服务器通常会关闭 。When the severity level is 20 or greater, the server usually closes the . 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. 最后两种情况下，执行该命令的方法将生成 。In both cases, a is generated by the method executing the command. 由 SQL Server 生成的错误的详细信息，请参阅[原因和数据库引擎错误的解决方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms365262.aspx)。For more information on errors generated by SQL Server, see [Cause and Resolution of Database Engine Errors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms365262.aspx). 有关严重性级别的详细信息，请参阅[数据库引擎错误严重性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms164086.aspx)。For more information about severity levels, see [Database Engine Error Severities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms164086.aspx). ## Examples 下面的示例显示各个内集合。The following example displays each within the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public byte Class { get; }
.property instance unsigned int8 Class
Public ReadOnly Property Class As Byte
public: property System::Byte Class { System::Byte get(); };

summary.span: 获取从 SQL Server 返回的错误的严重级别。

span.span: Gets the severity level of the error returned from SQL Server.

value.span: 一个 1 至 25 的值，它指示错误的严重级别。

span.span: A value from 1 to 25 that indicates the severity level of the error.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 严重级别为 10 或以下的消息为信息性的，并指示问题是由用户输入的信息中的错误导致的。Messages with a severity level of 10 or less are informational and indicate problems caused by mistakes in information that a user has entered. 严重级别为 11 到 16 都由用户，并可以由用户纠正。Severity levels from 11 through 16 are generated by the user, and can be corrected by the user. 严重级别为 17 到 25 的消息指示存在软件或硬件错误。Severity levels from 17 through 25 indicate software or hardware errors. 当级别为 17 时、 18 或 19 的错误时，您可以继续工作，尽管你可能不能够执行特定语句。When a level 17, 18, or 19 error occurs, you can continue working, although you might not be able to execute a particular statement. 当严重级别为 19 或以下时， 将保持打开状态。The remains open when the severity level is 19 or less. 当严重度等于或大于 20 时，服务器通常会关闭 。When the severity level is 20 or greater, the server usually closes the . 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. 最后两种情况下，执行该命令的方法将生成 。In both cases, a is generated by the method executing the command. 有关由 SQL Server 生成的错误的更多信息，请参见 SQL Server 联机丛书。For more information on errors generated by SQL Server, see SQL Server Books Online. ## Examples 下面的示例显示各个内集合。The following example displays each within the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlError.State Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError.State Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlError.State Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError.State Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int LineNumber { get; }
.property instance int32 LineNumber
Public ReadOnly Property LineNumber As Integer
public: property int LineNumber { int get(); };

summary.span: 从包含错误的 Transact-SQL 批命令或存储过程中获取行号。

span.span: Gets the line number within the Transact-SQL command batch or stored procedure that contains the error.

value.span: Transact-SQL 批命令或存储过程内包含错误的行号。

span.span: The line number within the Transact-SQL command batch or stored procedure that contains the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行号从 1 开始。Line numbering starts at 1. 如果值为 0，则行号不适用。If the value is 0, the line number is not applicable. 有关由 SQL Server 生成的错误的更多信息，请参见 SQL Server 联机丛书。For more information on errors generated by SQL Server, see SQL Server Books Online. ## Examples 下面的示例显示各个内集合。The following example displays each within the collection. .property instance string Message

public: property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the text describing the error.

value.span: 对错误进行描述的文本。

span.span: The text describing the error.

value.span: 有关由 SQL Server 生成的错误的更多信息，请参见 SQL Server 联机丛书。

public: property int Number { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个标识错误类型的数字。

span.span: Gets a number that identifies the type of error.
The number that identifies the type of error.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表介绍了此属性的可能值：The following table describes the possible values for this property: |错误的来源Source of Error|SqlError.NumberSqlError.Number|SqlError.StateSqlError.State|SqlException 具有内部 Win32Exception （开始 with.NET Framework 4.5）SqlException has inner Win32Exception (beginning with.NET Framework 4.5)| |---------------------|---------------------|--------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |来自服务器的错误Error from server|服务器错误代码Server error code

此数字对应于将项记入`master.dbo.sysmessages`表。This number corresponds to an entry in the `master.dbo.sysmessages` table.|通常大于 0Typically greater than 0|否No| |连接超时Connection timeout|-2-2|00|是 (数 = 258)Yes (Number = 258)| |通信错误 (非 LocalDB)Communication error (non-LocalDB)|Win32 错误代码Win32 error code|00|是 (数 = Win32 错误代码)Yes (Number = Win32 error code)| |通信错误 (LocalDB)Communication error (LocalDB)|Win32 错误代码Win32 error code|00|否No| |加密功能不匹配Encryption capability mismatch|2020|00|否No| |无法启动 LocalDBFailed to start LocalDB|Win32 错误代码Win32 error code|00|否No| |只读路由失败Read-only routing failure|00|00|否No| |服务器时出现严重错误处理查询Server had severe error processing query|00|00|否No| |分析结果时的处理的取消Processed cancellation while parsing results|00|00|否No| |创建用户实例失败Failed to create user instance|00|00|否No| 有关由 SQL Server 生成的错误的更多信息，请参见 SQL Server 联机丛书。For more information on errors generated by SQL Server, see SQL Server Books Online. ## Examples 下面的示例显示各个内集合。The following example displays each within the collection. summary.span: 某些错误消息可能在数据库引擎的代码中多次引发。

span.span: Some error messages can be raised at multiple points in the code for the Database Engine.

summary.span: 例如，几种不同的情况下可引发 1105 错误。

span.span: For example, an 1105 error can be raised for several different conditions.

summary.span: 引发错误的每种特定情况将分配一个唯一状态代码。

span.span: Each specific condition that raises an error assigns a unique state code.
The state code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从服务器收到的错误是只能设置状态。State is only set for errors that are received from the server. 由 SQL Server 生成的错误的详细信息，请参阅[了解数据库引擎错误](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms165761.aspx)。For more information on errors generated by SQL Server, see [Understanding Database Engine Errors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms165761.aspx). ## Examples 下面的示例显示各个内集合。The following example displays each within the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlError.State Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError.State Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlError.State Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError.State Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

.method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String
public: override System::String ^ ToString();

summary.span: 获取错误信息的完整文本。

span.span: Gets the complete text of the error message.
The complete text of the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串是在窗体"SqlError:"后, 跟，和堆栈跟踪。The string is in the form "SqlError:", followed by the , and the stack trace. 例如:For example: SqlError:UserId 或密码无效。SqlError:UserId or Password not valid. \<堆栈跟踪 >\ ## Examples 下面的示例显示各个内集合。The following example displays each within the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
